story: Today I did not think I would be able to exercise, but I did!

After the car accident, I did not think I would ever be able to exercise like I used to. That is partly true, but every little bit helps. Next week I will be running my first marathon since the accident. Proud of myself for doing a liitle every day.
I feel so much better, healthier, and closer to God than ever before since taking the steps to become not only healthier physically, but mentally as well. Exercise really helps!
